overview:
Vivahabandhan is an Indian Matrimonial Web Portal, Astrology Service, Chat Facility and Downloadable Toolbar

Vivahabandhan.com, India’s most comprehensive matrimonial portal, is professionally developed by a team of young professionals, dedicated to those people who searching for their prospective partners. Vivahabandhan.com is a one stop venue where you can relate and find your soulmate among the web’s largest community of qualified, appropriate singles.

You can register for free with Vivahabandhan.com, and build an astonishing profile to make yourself approachable by other registered members and take a look at thousands of profiles with photos through which you are bound to find that special person. This Portal gives people the opportunity to place their profiles on the Internet with secured collaborative tools like â€œUpload Photos, Videos, Horoscopeâ€, â€œExpress Interestâ€ etc. Modify your profile as and when required. You can use the basic search functionality to search for a profile even without logging into the system. All of its features are built to process the information logically and is presented to you in an effective manner.

Vivahabandhan is operated, promoted and owned by Avvas Infotech Pvt Ltd. and Agri gold group, a global provider of enterprise application software and application management services. We are a vibrant team of young professionals who came together with common goals and operating from Bangalore, India.

VivahaBandhan has a great and fastest growing amount of data which comes from online members, group agents, agencies and sub agencies covering the rural regions. The data base includes bio-data of boys and girls from various fields of life i.e. Medicos, Engineers, IT Professionals, Software Engineers, Professors, Teachers, Entrepreneurs, Industrialist, Businessmen, Self Employed, Employees in private & public sectors etc. It also includes bio-data of well educated homely girls. Are you still in the reception room waiting for that perfect person?
